title: Inclusive Language Education Design for Students with Intellectual Disabilities: UDL-Based Short-Term Intensive Course

context.additional_context: The need to create flexible educational environments considering individual cognitive levels and learning paces, emphasizing real-world application skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Students can utilize 50 essential daily vocabulary items contextually through UDL-based instructional methods
Students apply at least three communication strategies through project-based learning activities (role-playing/portfolio creation)
Students achieve over 80% of language learning objectives using diverse media (visual/auditory/tactile materials)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
